column17:
Rohit Bal Men's Brown Belt and Black Wallet:
Rohit Bal's exclusive collection for Bag It Today is all about luxury and richness. This combo features a brown belt and a black bi-fold wallet from the same collection. Both the belt and wallet are crafted using leather which is loved by men worldwide. The belt comes with a convenient golden buckle which has the designer's signature carved on it. A lotus motif can be seen on the spacious wallet which adds a dash of elegance to it. Buy this combo from Rohit Bal and feel delighted of an amazing purchase.

column2: rohit bal mens leather belt - black
column17: Increase your style quotient by adding this elegant belt from ace designer Rohit Bal to your ensemble. It showcases a sleek metal buckle with designer's signature engraved on it. Wear this designer belt and ensure that things stay at their place.

column14: Rohit Bal Men's Leather Wallet Black
column17: Treat yourself to luxury by owning this elegant wallet from the fashion house of Rohit Bal. This formal bi-fold black wallet for men comes with classy exterior & well-organized interior to hold your belongings like cash and cards with utmost ease.

column17:
Rohit Bal Men's Brown Leather Belt:
Acclaimed designer Rohit Bal is out with his latest collection for 2013 which also includes this brown belt. The chocolaty hue of brown on this belt is accentuated with a golden buckle. As this belt is made of leather it is bound to stay with you for long without much wear and tear. Featuring the designer's carved signature this belt is perfect for those who like to collect exclusive accessories. Wear this classy belt from Rohit Bal on top of cream trousers and brown shirt for an elegant ensemble.
